translations.Browse and view your \"souvenirs\" album: Browse and view your "souvenirs" albums on nextcloud web interface
translations.View and share albums made by the [Souve:
View and share albums made by the [Souvenirs android application](https://github.com/zorgluf/souvenirs-android).
    \nThis application is just a viewer. No album creation or edition features are available for the moment. You will need to create albums using the android app and sync them to your nextcloud server.
translations.No album available. You will need to upl: No album available. You will need to upload them from the Android app Souvenirs (https://github.com/zorgluf/souvenirs-android).
Click to download album in a zip file.
